languages.text: "Извлеки максимум пользы, Леттард. Если понимание этой болезни поможет тебе достичь новых знаний о природе нечестивых хворей — получишь столько подопытных, сколько захочешь. Можешь уморить их всех".

traits.locale_text: "Извлеки максимум пользы, Летард, — поэкспериментируй заодно с другими болезнями. Конечно, не все матросы выживут, но ты узнаешь много полезного на благо корабля".

languages.text: "Make the most of it, Forius. If understanding this disease will indeed let you delve deeper into the nature of wicked afflictions, then you may have as many test subjects as you need. You may expend them all if that is what it takes."
languages.original_text: "Извлеки максимум пользы, Леттард. Если понимание этой болезни поможет тебе достичь новых знаний о природе нечестивых хворей — получишь столько подопытных, сколько захочешь. Можешь уморить их всех".

"Make the most of it, Forius. If understanding this disease will indeed let you delve deeper into the nature of wicked afflictions, then you may have as many test subjects as you need. You may expend them all if that is what it takes."

languages.text: « Faites au mieux, Forius. Si la compréhension de cette maladie peut vous permettre de cerner la nature des affections impies, on vous fournira pour ce faire autant de cobayes que nécessaire, quitte à tous les sacrifier s'il le faut. »
languages.original_text: "Make the most of it, Forius. If understanding this disease will indeed let you delve deeper into the nature of wicked afflictions, then you may have as many test subjects as you need. You may expend them all if that is what it takes."

traits.locale_text: « Faites au mieux, Forius. Si la compréhension de cette maladie peut vous permettre de cerner la nature des affections impies, on vous fournira pour ce faire autant de cobayes que nécessaire, quitte à tous les sacrifier s'il le faut. »

languages.text: «Haga lo que esté en su mano, Forius. Si comprender esta enfermedad va a ayudarle a internarse en lo más profundo de las aflicciones malignas, dispondrá de todos los sujetos de prueba que necesite. Utilícelos a todos si hace falta».
languages.original_text: "Make the most of it, Forius. If understanding this disease will indeed let you delve deeper into the nature of wicked afflictions, then you may have as many test subjects as you need. You may expend them all if that is what it takes."

traits.locale_text: «Haga lo que esté en su mano, Forius. Si comprender esta enfermedad va a ayudarle a internarse en lo más profundo de las aflicciones malignas, dispondrá de todos los sujetos de prueba que necesite. Utilícelos a todos si hace falta».

languages.text: 「最大限に活用するのだ、フォーリアス。この病気を理解することで、邪悪な病の本質をより深く掘り下げることができるのであれば、必要なだけ被験者を増やしても構わない。必要であれば、全員を消費してもかまわない」
languages.original_text: "Make the most of it, Forius. If understanding this disease will indeed let you delve deeper into the nature of wicked afflictions, then you may have as many test subjects as you need. You may expend them all if that is what it takes."

traits.locale_text: 「最大限に活用するのだ、フォーリアス。この病気を理解することで、邪悪な病の本質をより深く掘り下げることができるのであれば、必要なだけ被験者を増やしても構わない。必要であれば、全員を消費してもかまわない」

languages.text: “把握好这个机会，弗里乌斯。如果你的研究可以帮助你更加深入了解这种疾病的本质，那你可以根据你的需要进行试验。如果有必要的话，可以把这些人当做耗材处理。”
languages.original_text: "Make the most of it, Forius. If understanding this disease will indeed let you delve deeper into the nature of wicked afflictions, then you may have as many test subjects as you need. You may expend them all if that is what it takes."

traits.locale_text: “把握好这个机会，弗里乌斯。如果你的研究可以帮助你更加深入了解这种疾病的本质，那你可以根据你的需要进行试验。如果有必要的话，可以把这些人当做耗材处理。”

languages.text: "Macht etwas daraus, Forius. Wenn Ihr durch das Verständnis dieser Krankheit tatsächlich das Wesen dieses Übels ergründen könnt, nehmt Euch so viele Testsubjekte wie Ihr braucht. Ihr könnt sie alle aufbrauchen, wenn es nötig ist."
languages.original_text: "Make the most of it, Forius. If understanding this disease will indeed let you delve deeper into the nature of wicked afflictions, then you may have as many test subjects as you need. You may expend them all if that is what it takes."

traits.locale_text: "Macht etwas daraus, Forius. Wenn Ihr durch das Verständnis dieser Krankheit tatsächlich das Wesen dieses Übels ergründen könnt, nehmt Euch so viele Testsubjekte wie Ihr braucht. Ihr könnt sie alle aufbrauchen, wenn es nötig ist."

languages.text: "Bunu en iyi şekilde değerlendir Forius. Bu hastalığı anlamak, menfur illetlerin tabiatını derinlemesine anlamana olanak sunacaksa dilediğin kadar denek alabilirsin. Gerektiği takdirde onları harcayabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Make the most of it, Forius. If understanding this disease will indeed let you delve deeper into the nature of wicked afflictions, then you may have as many test subjects as you need. You may expend them all if that is what it takes."
